instruction: Summarize an article with title "The Impact of Artificial Intelligence on Education".
output: This article outlines the potential implications and opportunities presented by advancing artificial intelligence on the education system. It looks at the potential for AI to revolutionize the classroom, offering qualitative feedback to students and leveraging data to provide individualized instruction and support. Additionally, the article highlights challenges such as bias and equity issues, particularly in context of minority groups, when introducing AI technology into the education system. Finally, the article discusses the potential for AI to improve exam outcomes and provide more in-depth feedback to students based on their individual performance.
